models.description: The iPhone 15 Pro features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, a powerful A16 Bionic chip, and a triple-lens camera system for capturing incredible photos and videos. Enjoy the convenience of 5G connectivity, MagSafe technology for seamless accessories, and secure Face ID.

The iPhone 15 boasts a vibrant Liquid Retina HD display, powered by the advanced A16 Bionic chip. Capture beautiful moments with the dual-lens camera system and enjoy the benefits of 5G connectivity and Face ID for enhanced security.

The iPhone 15 mini packs powerful features into a compact design. Enjoy the stunning Super Retina XDR display, dual-lens camera system, and the performance of the A16 Bionic chip. Stay connected with 5G and benefit from the security of Face ID.
